children.child_desc1: Minute ventillation for normal CO2 when not intubated = 60 ml/kg/min. Double to 120 mL/kg/min when intubated 2/2 t dead space Mild hypercarbia is ok.

children.child_desc:
Goal: PaO2 55-80 mmHg or SpO2 99-95% 
 -Start at 100% FiO2 and PEEP of 5, start at higher peep for severe hypoxemia 
 -Wait 15-20 min, then draw an ABG 
 -Titrate FiO2 and PEEP based on chart every 5-10 min; quicker if low sat

Goal: <= 30cm H2O 
 if > 30, reduce Vt by 1mL/kg IBW down to 4mL/kg IBW

children.special_instruction_header: *Consider lower dosage for hemodynamically unstable patients

children.special_instruction_footer:
SUX Contraindications  
 Hx malignant hyperthermia 
 >48hr old spinal cord injury/burns 
 NMJ Dz 
 SUSPECTED HyperK GBS 
 Crush Injury
